metadata.title: CVE-2018-21010 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenJPEG before 2.3.1 has a heap buffer overflow in color_apply_icc_profilein bin/common/color.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-21010` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenjp2-7 - 2.3.1-1
libopenjp2-tools - 2.3.1-1
libopenjp3d-tools - 2.3.1-1
libopenjp3d7 - 2.3.1-1
libopenjpip-dec-server - 2.3.1-1
libopenjpip-server - 2.3.1-1
libopenjpip-viewer - 2.3.1-1
libopenjpip7 - 2.3.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-1').
insighttoolkit4 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
